language.name: English
screen.serverdownloader.confirm_download: %s mod(s) need to be downloaded to join the server
screen.serverdownloader.complete_downloa: Downloaded %s Files in %s. The game must be restarted to join the server.
button.serverdownloader.restart.tooltip: Pressing this will cause a fake crash so the launcher will re-open. This button is supposed to crash the game.
